alert.note: Alert for Dinwiddie; Greensville; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:32PM EDT until August 10 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GREENSVILLE...WEST CENTRAL SUSSEX AND SOUTHEASTERN DINWIDDIE COUNTIES... At 632 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carson, or 11 miles southwest of Disputanta, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Greensville, west central Sussex and southeastern Dinwiddie Counties, including the following locations... Rocky Run, Wharfs Store, Cherry Hill and Butterworth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
